questions.question: Partial Quotients is a method used to do what operation in Math?
Why is a multiple of 10 a good number to start with?

choices.answer: Because multiples of 10 are easy to work with.
Because multiples of 10 are used to estimate.
Because multiples of 10 are compatible with all numbers.
Because multiples of 10 are not easy to work with.

questions.question: Where do you record your guesses or partial quotients?

choices.answer: in a separate column to the right of the problem.
at the very end of your problem.
in a separate column to the left of the problem.

questions.question: How do you find the final quotient(the answer) when using partial quotients?

choices.answer: by dividing the numbers using long division
by adding all of the partial quotients together.

questions.question: How many steps does it take to find the quotient,using partial quotients?
